statement.tex: %text What is the principal value of $\cos^{-1}\left(\cos \dfrac{2\pi}{3}\right)+\sin^{-1}\left(\sin\dfrac{2\pi}{3}\right)$? %

step.context: %text What is the range of principal values of $\cos^{-1}x$ and $\sin^{-1}x$ functions? %
step.reason: %text Principal value interval of the $\cos^{-1}$ and $\sin^{-1}$ functions is the earliest interval which covers the entire range $[-1,1]$ of $\sin$ and $\cos$ functions. As can be seen from the table: % \begin{tabular}{|c|c|} \hline \cos^{-1}(-1)=0, \cos^{-1}(1)=\pi & [0, \pi] \\ \hline \sin^{-1}(-1)=-\dfrac{\pi}{2}, \sin^{-1}(1)=\dfrac{\pi}{2} & \left[-\dfrac{\pi}{2}, \dfrac{\pi}{2}\right] \\ \hline \end{tabular}
